title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: This repository contains all the projects from my Object-Oriented programming class. This is the first time I touched OOP, good for referencing progress.

title: OS pointers
description: First assignment from Operating Systems class. Learned how pointers work in C++.

title: OS scheduling
description: Second assignment from Operating Systems class. Learned how the scheduler work and implmented it.

title: OS Shell
description: Third assignment from Operating Systems class. Implemented our own shell to understand what role it plays in the Operating System.

title: OS File Explorer
description: Last assignment from Operating Systems class. Implemented a file explorer with a GUI library.
